summary: A simple retexture of the Nordic Steel Plate armor, replacing the black cloth texture with a chainmail texture.
descriptionHtml:
Nordic Plate Chainmail by cyborgakadjmoose


--DESCRIPTION--

A simple retexture of the Nordic Plate armor, replacing the black cloth texture with a chainmail texture.


--INSTALL--


Simply extract the texture files into the Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data directory and then go check it out ingame!


--UNINSTALL--


Remove the folder \"nordplate\" from your Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor directory.



--CHANGE LOG--

v1
- Initial Release

v1.1
- Changed the chainmail to a better, darker shade.

PERMISSIONS

If you would like to use this retexture in your mod, please ask first and then please give me proper credit.  If you have any suggestions or requests, shoot me a message.  As far as when something else would be released, it all depends on how much free time I have.


--CREDITS-- 


Thanks to [url=http://ninja-ryo.deviantart.com/art/PS6-PATTERNS-Chainmail-194429061]Ninja-Ryo[/url] for the chainmail pattern.  See also [url=http://ninja-ryo.deviantart.com/journal/Opinions-needed-about-stock-use-221462297]this[/url] for clarification
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
author: cyborgakadjmoose
